Crumble

Crumble:-250- [25/lvl] ?
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster unleashes great power upon a besieged castle. The walls of the castle will fall apart and debris will crash down upon the unwary defenders.
The walls will take 250 points of damage +25 points for each additional Earth skill level. 50% of the defenders must roll for defence or get 3 AP blunt damage.
